title: Coerver coaching method. Vol. 2.
brief_description: Wiel Coerver, renowned Dutch soccer champion teaches a comprehensive range of soccer skills. Volume 2 of this three-part collection includes the following playing techniques: moves to beat an opponent, one on one, fakes, moves to get past opponents.
